thread.title: Meet the World’s Fittest Female Firefighter
thread.title_full: Meet the World’s Fittest Female Firefighter

author: Barry K
title: Meet the World’s Fittest Female Firefighter
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
For her day job, firefighter Gunn Narten douses infernos and saves lives—enough to be a hero in anyone’s eyes. But somehow the 30-year-old Norwegian also finds time to be a personal trainer and moonlight as one of the fittest women on Instagram, posting photos of her tough workouts and physical feats in unique locations, including her local firehouse. (There’s even a photo of Narten “overhead pressing” a fire truck . . . but we’ll assume there’s some trickery happening in that one.) It isn’t every day you find a strong, sexy woman wearing all that bulky firefighting gear—but that’s exactly why Narten joined the profession in the first place. 
“I have always loved being active and being part of a team,” Narten told The Daily Mail . “When I found out you could combine this with a physical job, challenging tasks and doing something good for others, the choice was easy. When I applied for the job in the fire department my mom said, ‘I have never heard of a female firefighter before . . . why you?’ And I answered, ‘Why not me?’” Advertisement
